title: Elnsburg — The City of Tiers
summary: High Elnsburg, Mid Elnsburg, and Low Elnsburg — and the factions that bind them.

body.raw: Elnsburg is divided into three tiers with a council tangled between Matriarchs and Patriarchs.

title: On Curses and Their Permanence
summary: A primer on the rules and risks of curses in the Continuum.

body.raw: Curses are permanent in this setting; breaking them has a cost even saints decline to pay.
body.code:
